column2: "Na mo so
column3: enuanom
column4: menntum annkasa annkyerɛ hom dɛ sunsum mu mba na mbom dɛ honam mu mba

column2: "Numfonsu na medze maa hom na hom nomee
column3: na nnyɛ edziban bi a: na hom nnyae nntumii: eso seseiara hom nntum

column2: "osiandɛ hom da ho yɛ honam mu nyimpa. Mbrɛ nyinkun nye wentwiwentwi wɔ hom mu yi
column3: ana hom nnyɛ honam mu nyimpa
column4: na nnyɛ nyimpamu bra na hom robɔ yi?"

column2: "Na sɛ obi se dɛ
column3: Emi dze
column8: nna nnyɛ honammufo nye hom anaa?"

column2: "Na Apollos nye woana? Na Paul nye woana? Wɔyɛ asomfo a hom nam hɔn do gyee dzii
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze dze maa hɔn mu biara."

column2: "Emi na muduae
column3: Apollos na oguguu do nsu naaso Nyankopɔn na ɔmaa ndɔbaa no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi nnyɛ nyia odua na ɔyɛ biribi
column3: eso nnyɛ nyia ogugu do nsu a
column4: na Nyankopɔn a ɔma ndɔbaa no a."

column2: "Na nyia odua nye nyia ogugu do nsu yɛ kor
column3: na hɔn mu biara benya nankasa n’akatua dɛ mbrɛ nankasa n’edwuma tse."

column2: "Na hɛn dze
column3: yɛyɛ Nyankopɔn no nkowaa a yɛnye no reyɛ edwuma; na hom so yɛ Nyankopɔn ne haban

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn adom a ɔdze adom me tse
column3: dɛ ɔdantofo panyin nyansafo
column5: na obi so rotow do. Na wɔmma obiara nhwɛ yie mbrɛ odua tow do."

column2: "Na fapem fofor biara dze
column3: obiara runntum nnto nnka dza wɔato no ho

column2: "Na sɛ obiara dze sika
column3: dwetɛ
column7: nye mburonan tow fapem no do a;"

column2: "obiara n’edwuma bɛda edzi: na da no beyi ato gua
column3: osiandɛ wɔnam ogya do beyi akyerɛ
column4: na ogya no ara bɔsɔ obiara n’edwuma ahwɛ

column2: "Sɛ obiara n’edwuma a ɔatow wɔ do no tum gyina a
column3: obenya akatua."

column2: "Sɛ obiara n’edwuma hyew a
column3: onnkenya hwee
column4: na nankasa dze wɔbɛgye no nkwa
column5: naaso ɔbɛyɛ dɛ oduaa ogya mu."

column2: "Ana hom nnyim dɛ hom yɛ Nyankopɔn asɔrfi
column3: na Nyankopɔn Sunsum no tse hom mu?"

column2: "Sɛ obiara sɛɛ Nyankopɔn asɔrfi a
column3: ɔno so Nyankopɔn bɛsɛɛ no: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn asɔrfi ho tsew

column2: "Mma obi nndaadaa noho. Sɛ obiara susu dɛ ɔyɛ hom mu nyansafo wɔ wiadze yi mu a
column3: wɔmma ɔnyɛ kwasea ama ɔaayɛ nyansafo."

column2: "Na wiadze yi nyansaa yɛ nkwaseasɛm wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim. Na wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column3: Ɔno na ɔkyer enyansafo wɔ hɔn enyitsew mu;"

column2: "na bio
column3: Nyankopɔn nyim enyansafo adwendwen dɛ ɔyɛ adwendwen hun."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma obi nnhyehyɛ noho wɔ nyimpa mu. Na adze nyina yɛ homdze;"
"Paul o
column3: Apollos o
column9: dza ɔrebɛba o; ne nyina yɛ homdze;"

column2: "Na hom yɛ Kraest dze
column3: na Kraest so yɛ Nyankopɔn dze."
